	private static void del() {// 输入员工id和姓名删除，需要考虑道后续员工的id编号
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		System.out.println("请选中删除的员工id");
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int id = sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("请输入删除员工的姓名");
		String name = sc.next();

		Emp e = new Emp();
		e.setempID(id);
		e.setName(name);
		int index = list.indexOf(e);// 获得list的下标
		System.out.println("删除前" + list.get(index));
		list.set(index, null);

		System.out.println("删除后" + list.get(index));

	}
